service.name: duplicateProduct
service.description: Duplicate a Product using a new productId

service.name: saveProductPriceChange
service.description: Save History of a ProductPrice Change

service.name: copyCategoryProductMembers
service.description: Copy Product Members from one Category to Another, optionally filtering by the given valid date (otherwise no date filtering done), and optionally recursing (if recurse=Y) down the from category

service.name: expireAllCategoryProductMembers
service.description: Expire All Product Members in a Category optionally using the thruDate specified as the expire date (now timestamp used by default)

service.name: removeExpiredCategoryProductMembers
service.description: Remove All Expired Product Members in a Category, optionally uses the valid date instead of now to determine if the member has expired

service.name: safeAddProductCategoryToCategory
service.description: Safe Add ProductCategory To Category (requires fromDate)

service.name: calculateProductPrice
service.description: Calculate a Product's Price from ProductPriceRules

service.name: getProductInventoryAvailable
service.description: Get Inventory Availability for a Product

service.name: getInventoryAlerts
service.description: Get all Inventory Alerts in effect for a given catalog

service.name: emailInventoryAlerts
service.description: Get all Inventory Alerts in effect for a given catalog

service.name: getInventoryAvailableByFacility
service.description: Get Inventory Availability for a Product constrained by a facilityId

service.name: getInventoryAvailableByContainer
service.description: Get Inventory Availability for a Product constrained by a containerId

service.name: reserveProductInventory
service.description: Reserve Inventory for a Product. If requireInventory is Y the quantity not reserved is returned, if N then a negative availableToPromise will be used to track quantity ordered beyond what is in stock.

service.name: reserveProductInventoryByFacility
service.description: Reserve Inventory for a Product By Facility If requireInventory is Y the quantity not reserved is returned, if N then a negative availableToPromise will be used to track quantity ordered beyond what is in stock.

service.name: reserveProductInventoryByContainer
service.description: Reserve Inventory for a Product By Container If requireInventory is Y the quantity not reserved is returned, if N then a negative availableToPromise will be used to track quantity ordered beyond what is in stock.

service.name: cancelOrderInventoryReservation
service.description: Iterates through each OrderItemInventoryRes on each OrderItem for the order with the given orderId and cancels the reservation by changing the status of the OrderItemInventoryRes and incrementing the corresponding non-serialized inventoryItem's availableToPromise quantity, or setting the status of the corresponding serialized inventoryItem to available.

service.name: applyFeatureToProduct
service.description: Apply a ProductFeature to a Product; a fromDate can be used to specify when the feature will be applied, if no fromDate is specified, it will be applied now.

service.name: updateFeatureToProductApplication
service.description: Update a ProductFeature to Product Application

service.name: removeFeatureFromProduct
service.description: Remove a ProductFeature from a Product; a thruDate can be used to specify when the feature will be removed, if no thruDate is specified, it will be removed now.

service.name: applyFeatureToProductFromTypeAndCode
service.description: Apply a ProductFeature to a Product

service.name: getProductVariant
service.description: Gets a variant product value object.

service.name: getProductFeatureSet
service.description: Gets a Set of product features (distinct)

service.name: getProductVariantTree
service.description: Gets a tree of product variants based on a virtual product and a list of features.

service.name: getAllProductVariants
service.description: Gets a Collection of products from a 'virtual' parent product.

service.name: getAssociatedProducts
service.description: Finds associated products by the defined type.

service.name: getProductFeatures
service.description: Gets a Collection of product features (ProductFeatureAndAppl) for a product.

service.name: getPreviousNextProducts
service.description: Gets the previous and next product Ids.

service.name: getProductCategoryAndLimitedMembers
service.description: Gets a productCategory and a Collection of associated productCategoryMembers and calculates limiting parameters
